resources.string: Look like you have not %1$s anything yet!

- Minimum 2 years working in experience in programming 
- Familiar with : HTML, CSS, PHP, Python, Java, Javascript 
- Database skill(s) : SQL, SQL Server 
- Ability to work under pressure 
- Fast learner and willing to learn

- Develop new web application or customize existing application 
- Learn new technology when required in the process 
- Problem solving and working with team on a project 
- Troubleshoot, fix bugs, and debug code-related issues

Hacksaw Ridge adalah film yang mengisahkan kisah nyata Desmond Doss (diperankan oleh Andrew Garfield), seorang penentang bersumpah yang mendaftar ke dalam tentara Amerika selama Perang Dunia II tanpa membawa senjata dan kemudian menjadi pahlawan medis lapangan di Pertempuran Okinawa, menyelamatkan puluhan nyawa tanpa pernah mengambil nyawa manusia, mempertaruhkan hidupnya untuk melakukan tindakan penyelamatan yang penuh pengorbanan di tengah pertempuran yang brutal, yang akhirnya memenangkannya Medali Kehormatan Amerika Serikat.

Step 1: Copy Job Posting 
Tap and hold on the text of the job posting you are interested in until the selection handles appear. Adjust the handles to highlight the entire content, then select "Copy". 
 
Step 2: Open the App and Paste Text 
Launch the application and navigate to the scanning section. Find the designated text input field and tap to activate the keyboard. Paste the copied job posting content by tapping and selecting "Paste". 
 
Step 3: Initiate Scanning 
Look for the "Start Scanning" button and tap it to initiate the scanning process. Please wait while the system analyzes the job posting. 
 
Step 4: Review Scanning Results 
After the scanning process is complete, the results will be displayed, indicating whether the job posting is categorized as "FRAUD" or "REAL".
Password must be at least 6 characters!
Please copy the job vacancy text below
